prompts: Create an aquatic Pokemon with a tough shell and sharp spikes.
Imagine a mysterious Pokemon that hides in the sea and has a unique shape.
Show me a Pokemon that uses ice attacks and has a spiky exterior.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in underwater caves and has a blue hue.
Design a Pokemon with both water and ice abilities that looks formidable.
Make an intimidating Pokemon with a dark shell and piercing eyes.
Give me a Pokemon that can trap opponents with its powerful shell.
